distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-Pillow fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-28219: Fixed buffer overflow in _imagingcms.c (bsc#1222262)

Other fixes:
- Re-enabled build tests for s390x and ppc (bsc#1222553)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In _imagingcms.c in Pillow before 10.3.0, a buffer overflow exists because strcpy is used instead of strncpy.
notes.title: CVE description
